verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, to the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G2128"\w* \add be\add* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w blessings|strong="G2129"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \add places\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

According \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he hath \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2602"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, that \w we|strong="G2248"\w* should \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* without \w blame|strong="G0299"\w* \w before|strong="G2714"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*:

Having \w predestinated|strong="G4309"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the adoption of \w children|strong="G5206"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* to the good \w pleasure|strong="G2107"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*,

\w To|strong="G1519"\w* the \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w made|strong="G5487"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w accepted|strong="G5487"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w beloved|strong="G0025"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, the \w forgiveness|strong="G0859"\w* of \w sins|strong="G3900"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* to the \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*;

\w Wherein|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w abounded|strong="G4052"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prudence|strong="G5428"\w*;

Having made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* good \w pleasure|strong="G2107"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w purposed|strong="G4388"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*:

That \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w dispensation|strong="G3622"\w* of the \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* of \w times|strong="G2540"\w* he might gather together in \w one|strong="G0346"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \add even\add* in him:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* we have obtained an \w inheritance|strong="G2820"\w*, being \w predestinated|strong="G4309"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w* of him \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w* of his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* should \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* first \w trusted|strong="G4276"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add trusted\add*, after that ye \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*: \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* after that ye \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, ye were \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* with \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*,

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w earnest|strong="G0728"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w* \w until|strong="G1519"\w* the \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* of the purchased \w possession|strong="G4047"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\w* I \w also|strong="G2504"\w*, after I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w your|strong="G5209"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*,

\w Cease|strong="G3973"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to give \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w making|strong="G4160"\w* \w mention|strong="G3417"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, may \w give|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

The \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w understanding|strong="G1271"\w* being \w enlightened|strong="G5461"\w*; \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* the \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* the \w exceeding|strong="G5235"\w* \w greatness|strong="G3174"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w us-ward|strong="G2248"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w working|strong="G1753"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mighty|strong="G2479"\w* \w power|strong="G2904"\w*,

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w wrought|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, when he \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w set|strong="G2523"\w* \add him\add* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \add places\add*,

Far \w above|strong="G5231"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w principality|strong="G0746"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dominion|strong="G2963"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* that is \w named|strong="G3687"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* that which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w put|strong="G5293"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add to be\add* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w over|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add* to the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*,

\w Which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, the \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* of him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w filleth|strong="G4137"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.
